item.title: Siemens SiPass integrated V2.80
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Currently no remediation is available. Block both incoming and outgoing connections betwen the system and the Internet.See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 19:49:41 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.
